/.title: Where will your activity take place?
/.name: location
options: On or under the sea bed

components.html: Based on the information provided a licence is not required for the activity.

Based on the information provided your activity is one that meets the terms of an marine licence exemption set out in Article 19 of the Marine licence (exempted Activities) Order and a marine licence is therefore not required. This exemption does not require any action from you before it is undertaken.
Based on the information provided the activity does not require a marine licence from the MMO but you may require a marine licence from the relevant devolved administration.

Based on the information provided the activity requires a licence. No exemption is available and the activity is not suitable for self-service licensing.

Apply for a marine licence

/jurisdiction.title: Will your activity take place?
/jurisdiction.name: jurisdiction
/jurisdiction.hint: Not sure? Use the MMO’s interactive map to find out

/activity-type.title: What type of activity will be undertaken?
/activity-type.name: activityType
options: Construction (including alteration and improvement of existing works)
Deposit of a substance or object
Removal of a substance or object
Deposit or use of an explosive substance or object
Sinking of a vessel or floating container

/construction.title: What is the purpose of your activity?
/construction.name: activityType
options: Maintenance of existing structures and assets

/construction/maintenance.title: What does your activity relate to?
/construction/maintenance.name: maintenanceActivityType
options: Coastal Protection, drainage or flood defence
An activity carried on wholly under the sea in connection with the construction or operation of a bored tunnel

/construction/new.title: What does your activity relate to?
/construction/new.name: newActivityType
options: An emergency activity in response to flood or flood risk
An activity carried on wholly under the sea in connection with the construction or operation of a bored tunnel
Deep sea mining or scheduled works under the Crossrail Act

/deposit/method.title: How will the substance or object be deposited?
/deposit/method.name: method
options: From a floating container in the sea
From a structure on land constructed or adapted wholly or mainly for the purposes of depositing solids in the sea

/deposit/activity-type.title: What is the purpose of your activity?
/deposit/activity-type.name: activityType
options: Markers, moorings, pontoons and aids to navigations
Scientific research - instruments, associated equipment and tracers
Emergency – safety, pollution response and accident investigation
Vessels – Launching of vessels, rights of foreign vessels, deposits in the course of normal navigation, deposits in the course of aggregate or mineral dredging and dismantling of ships.
Defence activities, deep sea mining or scheduled works under the Crossrail act

/deposit/maintenance.title: Maintenance activity
/deposit/maintenance.name: maintenanceActivityType
options: Maintenance of coast protection, drainage or flood defence works
Emergency works in response to flood or flood risk

/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.title: Who will carry on the activity
/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.name: maintenanceCoastalProtectionImplementer
options: The Environment Agency or someone on behalf of the Environment Agency
The Coast Protection Authority or someone on behalf of the Coast Protection Authority

/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.title: Will the activity be carried on within the existing boundaries of the works being maintained?
/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.name: maintenanceCoastalProtectionEA

/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.title: Does the activity consist of beach replenishment?
/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.name: maintenanceCoastalProtectionEABeachReplenishment

/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.title: Is the activity for the purpose of maintaining coast protection works?
/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.name: maintenanceCoastalProtectionCPA
/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.hint: Carried on within the existing boundaries of the works being maintained.

/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.title: Does the activity consist of beach replenishment?
/deposit/maintenance/coastal-drainage-fl.name: maintenanceCoastalProtectionCPABeachReplenishment

/removal.title: Is the substance or object to be removed on the seabed?
/removal.name: isFromSeaBed
/removal.hint: ‘Seabed’ comprises the ground under the sea including anything laying on it such as a wreck

/removal/method.title: How will the removal be made?
/removal/method.name: method
options: A floating container in the sea
A structure on land constructed or adapted wholly or mainly for the purposes of depositing solids in the sea

/removal/activity-type.title: What is the purpose of your activity?
/removal/activity-type.name: activityType
options: Markers, moorings, pontoons and aids to navigation
Scientific research - instruments, associated equipment, samples and testing and analysis
Dead animals, litter, obstructions or accidental deposits
Emergency – safety, prevention of pollution and accident investigation
Vessels – Rights of foreign vessels and dismantling of ships
Defence activities, deep sea mining or scheduled works under the Crossrail act

/dredging.title: What is the purpose of your activity?
/dredging.name: activityType
options: Coastal Protection, drainage or flood defence
Vessels – Rights of foreign vessels and dismantling of ships
Deep sea mining or scheduled works under the Crossrail act

/incineration/method.title: Where will the substance or object be incinerated?
/incineration/method.name: method

/elsewhere-in-the-world/activity-type.title: What type of activity will be undertaken?
/elsewhere-in-the-world/activity-type.name: activityTypeElsewhere
options: Sinking of a vessel or floating container

/elsewhere-in-the-world/deposit.title: How will the deposit be made?
/elsewhere-in-the-world/deposit.name: method

/elsewhere-in-the-world/deposit/where-lo.title: Where was the substance or object to be deposited loaded?
/elsewhere-in-the-world/deposit/where-lo.name: loaded

/elsewhere-in-the-world/incineration.title: Where will the incineration take place?
/elsewhere-in-the-world/incineration.name: method
options: On a floating container controlled from a British vessel, British aircraft, or British marine structure.

/elsewhere-in-the-world/incineration/whe.title: Will the substance or object for incineration be loaded in any part of the United Kingdom (except Scotland)?
/elsewhere-in-the-world/incineration/whe.name: loadedInUk

/elsewhere-in-the-world/scuttling.title: How will the sinking be controlled?
/elsewhere-in-the-world/scuttling.name: method

/elsewhere-in-the-world/scuttling/towed-.title: Where will the vessel or container be towed or propelled from, for the purpose its sinking
/elsewhere-in-the-world/scuttling/towed-.name: towedOrPropelled
options: UK marine licensing area (unless towing or propelling began outside of that area)
